patthana1.4:8.1: Vipākaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca vipāko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—

patthana1.4:213.1: Vipākadhammadhammañca nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammañca dhammaṃ paccayā vipākadhammadhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana1.4:213.2: vipākadhammadhammaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā dve khandhā. #1
patthana1.4:215.1: Vipākaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā vipāko dhammo uppajjati adhipatipaccayā—
patthana1.4:217.2: nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe paccayā dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ, ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paccayā tayo mahābhūtā … pe …
patthana1.4:217.6: mahābhūte paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ upādārūpaṃ, vatthuṃ paccayā nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammā khandhā. #1
patthana1.4:218.1: Nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṃ paccayā vipāko dhammo uppajjati adhipatipaccayā—
patthana1.4:220.1: Nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṃ paccayā vipāko ca nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo ca dhammā uppajjanti adhipatipaccayā—
patthana1.4:220.2: vatthuṃ paccayā vipākā khandhā, mahābhūte paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. #4
patthana1.4:221.1: Nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṃ paccayā vipākadhammadhammo ca nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo ca dhammā uppajjanti adhipatipaccayā—
patthana1.4:221.2: vatthuṃ paccayā vipākadhammadhammā khandhā, mahābhūte paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. #5
patthana1.4:222.1: Vipākañca nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammañca dhammaṃ paccayā vipāko dhammo uppajjati adhipatipaccayā—
patthana1.4:222.2: vipākaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā dve khandhā. #1
patthana1.4:223.1: Vipākañca nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammañca dhammaṃ paccayā nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo uppajjati adhipatipaccayā—
patthana1.4:223.2: vipāke khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. #2
patthana1.4:224.1: Vipākañca nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammañca dhammaṃ paccayā vipāko ca nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo ca dhammā uppajjanti adhipatipaccayā—
patthana1.4:224.2: vipākaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā dve khandhā, vipāke khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. #3
patthana1.4:225.1: Vipākadhammadhammañca nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammañca dhammaṃ paccayā vipākadhammadhammo uppajjati adhipatipaccayā—
patthana1.4:225.2: vipākadhammadhammaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā dve khandhā. #1
patthana1.4:226.1: Vipākadhammadhammañca nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammañca dhammaṃ paccayā nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo uppajjati adhipatipaccayā—
patthana1.4:226.2: vipākadhammadhamme khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. #2
patthana1.4:227.1: Vipākadhammadhammañca nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammañca dhammaṃ paccayā vipākadhammadhammo ca nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo ca dhammā uppajjanti adhipatipaccayā—
patthana1.4:227.2: vipākadhammadhammaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā dve khandhā, vipākadhammadhamme khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. #3
patthana1.4:229.1: Vipākaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā vipāko dhammo uppajjati anantarapaccayā …
patthana1.4:231.4: vipākaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe paccayā dve khandhā;
patthana1.4:231.7: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vipākaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe paccayā dve khandhā. #1
patthana1.4:232.1: Vipākaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo uppajjati aññamaññapaccayā—
patthana1.4:233.1: Vipākaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā vipāko ca nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo ca dhammā uppajjanti aññamaññapaccayā—
patthana1.4:233.2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vipākaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā vatthu ca … pe … dve khandhe paccayā dve khandhā vatthu ca. #3
patthana1.4:234.2: vipākadhammadhammaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe paccayā dve khandhā. #1
patthana1.4:235.2: nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe paccayā dve khandhā, ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paccayā tayo mahābhūtā … pe …
patthana1.4:235.9: asaññasattānaṃ ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paccayā tayo mahābhūtā … pe …
patthana1.4:236.1: Nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṃ paccayā vipāko dhammo uppajjati aññamaññapaccayā—
patthana1.4:236.4: kāyāyatanaṃ paccayā kāyaviññāṇaṃ, vatthuṃ paccayā vipākā khandhā;
patthana1.4:238.1: Vipākañca nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammañca dhammaṃ paccayā vipāko dhammo uppajjati aññamaññapaccayā—
patthana1.4:238.2: cakkhuviññāṇasahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhañca cakkhāyatanañca paccayā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe ca cakkhāyatanañca paccayā dve khandhā,
patthana1.4:238.9: vipākaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā dve khandhā;
patthana1.4:238.12: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vipākaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā dve khandhā. #1
patthana1.4:239.1: Vipākadhammadhammañca nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammañca dhammaṃ paccayā vipākadhammadhammo uppajjati aññamaññapaccayā—
patthana1.4:239.2: vipākadhammadhammaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā dve khandhā. #1
patthana1.4:241.1: Vipākaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā vipāko dhammo uppajjati nissayapaccayā.
patthana1.4:243.3: vipākaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe paccayā dve khandhā, vatthuṃ purejātapaccayā (anantarasadisaṃ. Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana1.4:245.2: vipākadhammadhammaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā, tayo khandhe paccayā eko khandho, dve khandhe paccayā dve khandhā. #1
patthana1.4:248.1: Vipākadhammadhammañca nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammañca dhammaṃ paccayā vipākadhammadhammo uppajjati āsevanapaccayā—
patthana1.4:248.2: vipākadhammadhammaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā, tayo khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā eko khandho, dve khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā dve khandhā. #1
patthana1.4:250.1: Vipākaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā vipāko dhammo uppajjati kammapaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana1.4:252.1: Vipākaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā vipāko dhammo uppajjati vipākapaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana1.4:253.2: ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paccayā tayo mahābhūtā … pe …
patthana1.4:253.4: dve mahābhūte paccayā dve mahābhūtā, mahābhūte paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ kaṭattārūpaṃ upādārūpaṃ … pe …
patthana1.4:259.1: Hetuyā sattarasa, ārammaṇe satta, adhipatiyā sattarasa, anantare satta, samanantare satta, sahajāte sattarasa, aññamaññe nava, nissaye sattarasa, upanissaye satta, purejāte satta, āsevane cattāri, kamme sattarasa, vipāke nava, āhāre sattarasa, indriye sattarasa, jhāne sattarasa, magge sattarasa, sampayutte satta, vippayutte sattarasa, atthiyā sattarasa, natthiyā satta, vigate satta, avigate sattarasa.
patthana1.4:261.1: Hetupaccayā ārammaṇe satta, adhipatiyā sattarasa … pe … avigate sattarasa.
patthana1.4:267.1: Vipākaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā vipāko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana1.4:267.2: ahetukaṃ vipākaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā … tīṇi.
patthana1.4:268.2: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paccayā vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana1.4:269.2: ahetukaṃ nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā … pe …. #1
patthana1.4:270.1: Nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṃ paccayā vipāko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana1.4:272.1: Nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṃ paccayā vipāko ca nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo ca dhammā uppajjanti nahetupaccayā—
patthana1.4:272.2: vatthuṃ paccayā ahetukā vipākā khandhā, mahābhūte paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ, ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe … pe … #4
patthana1.4:273.1: Vipākañca nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammañca dhammaṃ paccayā vipāko dhammo uppajjati … pe …
patthana1.4:273.5: vipāko ca nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo ca dhammā uppajjanti nahetupaccayā … pe … tīṇi.
patthana1.4:274.1: Vipākadhammadhammañca nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammañca dhammaṃ paccayā vipākadhammadhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana1.4:274.2: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. #1
patthana1.4:276.1: Vipākaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā.
patthana1.4:279.1: Nahetuyā dvādasa, naārammaṇe pañca, naadhipatiyā sattarasa, naanantare pañca, nasamanantare pañca, naaññamaññe pañca, naupanissaye pañca, napurejāte dvādasa, napacchājāte sattarasa, naāsevane sattarasa, nakamme cattāri, navipāke nava, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne cattāri, namagge nava, nasampayutte pañca, navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā pañca, novigate pañca.
patthana1.4:283.1: Nahetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā dvādasa, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi … pe … nakamme ekaṃ, navipāke cattāri, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne cattāri, namagge nava, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana1.4:288.1: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe pañca, naadhipatiyā sattarasa … pe … novigate pañca.
patthana1.4:293.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe satta, anantare satta, samanantare satta, sahajāte dvādasa, aññamaññe nava, nissaye dvādasa, upanissaye satta, purejāte satta, āsevane cattāri, kamme dvādasa, vipāke nava, āhāre dvādasa, indriye dvādasa, jhāne dvādasa, magge tīṇi, sampayutte satta, vippayutte dvādasa, atthiyā dvādasa, natthiyā satta, vigate satta, avigate dvādasa.
patthana1.4:295.1: Nahetupaccayā naārammaṇapaccayā sahajāte tīṇi, aññamaññe dve … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana1.4:300.1: Vipākaṃ dhammaṃ nissāya vipāko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.4:300.2: vipākaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ nissāya tayo khandhā … pe ….
patthana1.4:303.1: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe pañca … pe … navippayutte tīṇi.
patthana1.4:304.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe satta … pe … avigate dvādasa.
patthana1.4:310.1: Vipākaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho vipāko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.4:310.2: vipākaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā.
patthana1.4:313.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi, anantare tīṇi, samanantare tīṇi, sahajāte tīṇi, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye tīṇi, upanissaye tīṇi, purejāte tīṇi, āsevane dve, kamme tīṇi, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre tīṇi, indriye tīṇi, jhāne tīṇi, magge tīṇi, sampayutte tīṇi, vippayutte tīṇi, atthiyā tīṇi, natthiyā tīṇi, vigate tīṇi, avigate tīṇi.
patthana1.4:318.1: Vipākaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho vipāko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana1.4:318.2: ahetukaṃ vipākaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe saṃsaṭṭhā dve khandhā.
patthana1.4:321.1: Nahetuyā tīṇi, na adhipatiyā tīṇi, napurejāte tīṇi, napacchājāte tīṇi, naāsevane tīṇi, nakamme dve, navipāke dve, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge dve, navippayutte tīṇi.
patthana1.4:325.1: Hetupaccayā naadhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … navippayutte tīṇi.
patthana1.4:329.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe tīṇi … pe … magge ekaṃ … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana1.4:334.1: Vipākaṃ dhammaṃ sampayutto vipāko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.4:334.2: vipākaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ sampayuttā tayo khandhā … pe ….
patthana1.4:344.1: Vipāko dhammo vipākassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.4:344.2: vipākā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana1.4:344.3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vipākā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.4:345.2: vipākā hetū cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana1.4:345.3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vipākā hetū kaṭattārūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.4:346.1: Vipāko dhammo vipākassa ca nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammassa ca hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.4:346.2: vipākā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana1.4:346.3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vipākā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana1.4:347.2: vipākadhammadhammā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.4:348.2: vipākadhammadhammā hetū cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.4:349.1: Vipākadhammadhammo vipākadhammadhammassa ca nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammassa ca hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.4:349.2: vipākadhammadhammā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana1.4:350.2: nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.4:352.1: Vipāko dhammo vipākassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.4:352.2: vipāke khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati, assādeti abhinandati;
patthana1.4:352.3: taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, vicikicchā uppajjati, uddhaccaṃ uppajjati, domanassaṃ uppajjati, kusalākusale niruddhe vipāko tadārammaṇatā uppajjati. #1
patthana1.4:353.2: sekkhā phalaṃ paccavekkhanti, vipāke khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti, assādenti abhinandanti;
patthana1.4:353.5: domanassaṃ uppajjati, cetopariyañāṇena vipākacittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānanti.
patthana1.4:353.6: Vipākā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.4:354.2: arahā phalaṃ paccavekkhati, vipāke khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati, cetopariyañāṇena vipākacittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānāti.
patthana1.4:354.3: Vipākā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana1.4:355.2: dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni paccavekkhati, jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṃ paccavekkhati, sekkhā gotrabhuṃ paccavekkhanti, vodānaṃ paccavekkhanti, sekkhā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ paccavekkhanti, sekkhā pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānanti, vipākadhammadhamme khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti, assādenti abhinandanti;
patthana1.4:355.5: domanassaṃ uppajjati, cetopariyañāṇena vipākadhammadhammacittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānanti.
patthana1.4:355.8: Vipākadhammadhammā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammupagañāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.4:356.2: vipākadhammadhamme khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti, assādenti abhinandanti;
patthana1.4:356.5: domanassaṃ uppajjati, kusalākusale niruddhe vipāko tadārammaṇatā uppajjati.
patthana1.4:357.2: arahā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni paccavekkhati.
patthana1.4:357.3: Arahā pahīne kilese paccavekkhati, pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānāti, vipākadhammadhamme khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati, cetopariyañāṇena vipākadhammadhammacittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānāti.
patthana1.4:357.6: Vipākadhammadhammā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammupagañāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana1.4:358.4: Arahā cakkhuṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati.
patthana1.4:358.15: nevavipākanavipākadhammadhamme khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati, dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti, cetopariyañāṇena nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammacittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānāti.
patthana1.4:358.18: Nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.4:359.3: Sekkhā vā puthujjanā vā cakkhuṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti, assādenti abhinandanti;

patthana1.4:362.1: Vipāko dhammo vipākassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.4:363.3: sekkhā phalaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti, vipāke khandhe garuṃ katvā assādenti abhinandanti;
patthana1.4:363.4: taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati. #2

patthana1.4:365.3: vipākādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #4

patthana1.4:366.5: taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.

patthana1.4:523.1: Nahetuyā soḷasa, naārammaṇe soḷasa, naadhipatiyā soḷasa, naanantare soḷasa, nasamanantare soḷasa, nasahajāte dvādasa, naaññamaññe dvādasa, nanissaye dvādasa, naupanissaye soḷasa, napurejāte cuddasa, napacchājāte soḷasa, naāsevane soḷasa, nakamme pannarasa, navipāke cuddasa, naāhāre soḷasa, naindriye soḷasa, najhāne soḷasa, namagge soḷasa, nasampayutte dvādasa, navippayutte dasa, noatthiyā dasa, nonatthiyā soḷasa, novigate soḷasa, noavigate dasa.
patthana1.4:525.1: Nahetupaccayā naārammaṇe soḷasa … pe … noavigate dasa.
patthana1.4:526.1: Yathā kusalattike paccanīyagaṇanā vitthāritā, evaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.
patthana1.4:530.1: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe satta, naadhipatiyā satta, naanantare satta, nasamanantare satta, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye satta, napurejāte satta, napacchājāte satta, naāsevane satta, nakamme satta, navipāke cattāri, naāhāre satta, naindriye satta, najhāne satta, namagge satta, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā satta, novigate satta.
patthana1.4:532.1: Hetu sahajāta nissaya atthi avigatanti naārammaṇe satta … pe … naaññamaññe tīṇi … pe … navipāke cattāri … pe … nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte tīṇi … pe … novigate satta.
patthana1.4:533.1: (Yathā kusalattike anulomapaccanīyagaṇanā vitthāritā, evaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ. Asammohantena eso sajjhāyamaggo.)
patthana1.4:537.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā dasa, anantare satta, samanantare satta, sahajāte ekādasa, aññamaññe satta, nissaye terasa, upanissaye nava, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane dve, kamme nava, vipāke tīṇi, āhāre satta, indriye nava, jhāne satta, magge satta, sampayutte tīṇi, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā terasa, natthiyā satta, vigate satta, avigate terasa.
patthana1.4:539.1: Nahetupaccayā naārammaṇapaccayā adhipatiyā satta … pe … avigate terasa.
